description:
If an entry level glove can do everything you need a glove to do, it becomes a win. Constructed with Giro’s Super Fit construction, the Bravo comfortably wrap your hands and provide a great connection to your cockpit. Strategically placed gel padding adds a layer protection between you and vibration. Mixed materials on the back of your hand let you enjoy the airflow, while wicking away sweat.

  • Gel padding smooths out your ride and helps protect your hands in the case of a spill
  • Stretchy synthetic on the back of the and wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • AX Suede™ palm is light, durable, breathable, and easy to clean
  • Microfibre on the thumb for wiping away sweat and sniffles
  • Fingertip pockets for easy removal
  • Paneled construction hugs the contours of your hands
  • Hook and loop closure at the cuffs, keeps your gloves right where you want them
name: Giro Bravo Gel Gloves - Unisex
